full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, ZHVA DMAR SNGAGS PA GU RU BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, LHA 'DI NYID YI DAM DU BYED PA MANG PO LA'ANG NA BAR MTHONG NAS, RGYAL KHAMS NYUL BA'I DHARMA BADZRA GYIS TSOGS 'KHOR SPYI DANG SGO BSTUN CING LIG @006B RNYING GI DGONGS PA DANG YANG MI 'GAL BAR, SNA TSOGS DBYIG CES PA SHING LO SPRUL GYI LO MI'I DBANG PO SPANG SPANG RATNA SIDDHI'I PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGA' BGYIS SO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
